lyric.verse: Tooi yoake yo nakigoto kike yo Kono mama jya omae yori mo deokurete shimaisoo sa Ashita kimeru yo eiga mo YAME da Ame dakara kasa mo nai nani mo kangaerarenai Yodomi yodonda kawa no soba Furuyo no manegotoshite mitai Suimen ni hageshiku uchitsukeru Ame no naka kaki kisareru ka bosoi koe ga Yoku aru hanashi koi no mukoogawa Kawa wa yodomu namida no ame furasete mo
lyric.chorus: YOU TAKE ME HIGHER orei nottera Taigai na yokuboomochi tsutzuketa mama Suberunda NEAR MISS suru n da Tooku made tsurete ikitai no ni
lyric.verse: Tsumaranai koto muchuu ni natta yo Sabishikute sabishikute hane ga mogesoosa Idooshuudan wo te ni ireru tame ni Sumu koto no nai kawa no naka tobikonda Otoru ni nareba wakaru no sa Kodomo no mama jya warakanai soo da
